languages.text: Багровые завихрения лишь путали мысли и чувства Вольного Торговца. {mf|Он|Она} слышал{mf||а} шепот и стоны, исходящие из глубин — стоит сделать шаг, и ты навсегда сгинешь в сем злосчастном тумане, присоединившись к хору несчастных... Но кто столь горестно молил о милости? Увы, разобрать то было не под силу.

traits.locale_text: Багровые завихрения лишь путают мысли и чувства Вольного Торговца. {mf|Он|Она} слышит шепот и стоны, исходящие из его глубин — стоит сделать шаг, и ты навсегда сгинешь в сем злосчастном тумане, присоединившись к хору несчастных... Но кто столь горестно молит о милости? Увы, не разобрать.

languages.text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.
languages.original_text: Багровые завихрения лишь путали мысли и чувства Вольного Торговца. {mf|Он|Она} слышал{mf||а} шепот и стоны, исходящие из глубин — стоит сделать шаг, и ты навсегда сгинешь в сем злосчастном тумане, присоединившись к хору несчастных... Но кто столь горестно молил о милости? Увы, разобрать то было не под силу.

languages.text: 深紅の渦は自由開拓者の思考と感情をかき乱した。ささやきとうめきが深淵から聞こえてくる。一歩踏み外せば、激しい霧の中を永久にさまよい、悲惨な群れの一員となるだろう…しかし声が聞こえてきた。必死に情けを乞う声だが、{name}にはその声の主が誰か分からなかった。
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: 深紅の渦は自由開拓者の思考と感情をかき乱した。ささやきとうめきが深淵から聞こえてくる。一歩踏み外せば、激しい霧の中を永久にさまよい、悲惨な群れの一員となるだろう…しかし声が聞こえてきた。必死に情けを乞う声だが、{name}にはその声の主が誰か分からなかった。

languages.text: 深红色的漩涡搅乱了行商浪人的思想与情感，{mf|他|她}听到来自深渊的低语声与呻吟声。只要{mf|他|她}再往前走一步，就会永远迷失在那狂暴的迷雾之中，加入那凄厉的合唱之中……然而，却有某个声音在拼命求饶。可那究竟是谁的声音？{name}分辨不出来。
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: 深红色的漩涡搅乱了行商浪人的思想与情感，{mf|他|她}听到来自深渊的低语声与呻吟声。只要{mf|他|她}再往前走一步，就会永远迷失在那狂暴的迷雾之中，加入那凄厉的合唱之中……然而，却有某个声音在拼命求饶。可那究竟是谁的声音？{name}分辨不出来。

languages.text: Malgré les tourbillons écarlates qui embrouillaient son esprit, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} percevait des murmures et des gémissements provenant des profondeurs. {mf|Il|Elle} le sentait au plus profond {mf|de lui|d'elle} : un pas de plus, et {mf|il|elle} se perdrait à jamais dans la brume pour se joindre à ce chœur de lamentations... Une voix en particulier semblait implorer pitié, mais {name} était bien incapable de dire à qui elle appartenait.
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: Malgré les tourbillons écarlates qui embrouillaient son esprit, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} percevait des murmures et des gémissements provenant des profondeurs. {mf|Il|Elle} le sentait au plus profond {mf|de lui|d'elle} : un pas de plus, et {mf|il|elle} se perdrait à jamais dans la brume pour se joindre à ce chœur de lamentations... Une voix en particulier semblait implorer pitié, mais {name} était bien incapable de dire à qui elle appartenait.

languages.text: Los torbellinos carmesíes nublaban la mente y las emociones {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Pudo oír susurros y gemidos procedentes de las profundidades. De haber dado un paso más, se habría perdido para siempre en esa violenta vorágine y se habría unido al coro de almas infortunadas... pero también oyó una voz que suplicaba misericordia desesperadamente. Mas de quién era la voz, eso {name} no lo pudo distinguir.
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: Los torbellinos carmesíes nublaban la mente y las emociones {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Pudo oír susurros y gemidos procedentes de las profundidades. De haber dado un paso más, se habría perdido para siempre en esa violenta vorágine y se habría unido al coro de almas infortunadas... pero también oyó una voz que suplicaba misericordia desesperadamente. Mas de quién era la voz, eso {name} no lo pudo distinguir.

languages.text: Die roten Wirbel verwirrten die Gedanken und Emotionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. {mf|Er|Sie} konnte Flüstern und Stöhnen aus der Tiefe hören. Mit einem einzigen Schritt wäre {mf|er|sie} für immer in diesem brutalen Nebel verloren gewesen und hätte sich dem elenden Chor angeschlossen ... Doch es gab auch eine Stimme, die verzweifelt um Gnade flehte. Wessen Stimme das aber war, das vermochte {name} nicht zu sagen.
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: Die roten Wirbel verwirrten die Gedanken und Emotionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. {mf|Er|Sie} konnte Flüstern und Stöhnen aus der Tiefe hören. Mit einem einzigen Schritt wäre {mf|er|sie} für immer in diesem brutalen Nebel verloren gewesen und hätte sich dem elenden Chor angeschlossen ... Doch es gab auch eine Stimme, die verzweifelt um Gnade flehte. Wessen Stimme das aber war, das vermochte {name} nicht zu sagen.

languages.text: Kızıl renkli girdaplar, Hür Tacir'in düşüncelerini ve duygularını allak bullak etti. Hür Tacir, derinlerden gelen fısıltı ve uğultuları duyabiliyordu. Tek bir adım dahi atsa ebediyen o şiddetli sisin içinde kaybolup o sefil koroya katılırdı. Gelgelelim can havliyle merhamet dileyen bir başka ses de vardı. {name} ise o sesin kime ait olduğunu çözemiyordu.
languages.original_text: The crimson swirls confused the Rogue Trader's thoughts and emotions. {mf|He|She} could hear whispers and moans coming from the depths. If {mf|he|she} were to take one step, {mf|he|she} would be forever lost in that violent mist and join the wretched chorus... But there was also a voice, so desperately pleading for mercy. Yet, whose voice it was, {name} could not tell.

traits.locale_text: Kızıl renkli girdaplar yüzünden Hür Tacir'in düşünceleri ve duyguları allak bullak oldu. Derinliklerden gelen fısıltı ve uğultuları duyabiliyordu. Tek bir adım dahi atsa, ebediyen o şiddetli sisin içinde kaybolup o sefil koroya katılırdı... Ancak can havliyle merhamet dileyen bir başka ses de vardı. {name} ise o sesin kime ait olduğunu çözemiyordu.
